sentences.en: If the information is not available elsewhere on the web, its notability cannot be assessed by Google .
sentences.cn: 如果这些信息不在网络上，它的知名度也无法通过谷歌来衡量。

sentences.en: Jimmy Wales, the founder of Wikipedia, has himself fallen foul of these tricky notability criteria.
sentences.cn: 就连维基的创始人,吉米?威尔士, 都为这些难以把握的标准犯难.

sentences.en: Since innovation throws open, the course of Urbanization develops rapidly, the visage of city changes with each passing day, demotic standard of living is improved notability.
sentences.cn: 改革开放以来，我国城市化进程得到了迅速发展，城市面貌日新月异，人民的生活水平得到了显著改善。

sentences.en: The condition of traffic is very convenient, notability superiority to the zone.
sentences.cn: 交通条件便利, 区位优势显著.

words.tran_cn: 值得注意的，显著的；著名的
著名的；显著的；附有乐谱的
注意；记下（note的过去式和过去分词）
